title: RdfConfiguration
description: Configuration for RDF/Knowledge Graph support in OpenMetadata

reasoningLevel.description: Level of reasoning/inference to apply to SPARQL queries

remoteEndpoint.description: SPARQL endpoint URL for remote RDF storage

inferenceEnabled.description: Enable inference/reasoning on SPARQL queries. When enabled, SPARQL queries will use the inference engine to derive additional triples based on the reasoning level.

defaultInferenceLevel.description: Default reasoning level for SPARQL queries when inference is enabled. CUSTOM provides OpenMetadata-specific inference rules including transitive lineage traversal and inverse relationships.

cacheInferredTriples.description: Cache inferred triples for better query performance (requires more storage)
